item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

9/17/2012's location is:
Buffalo Wild Wings

Buffalo Wild Wings is a Sports Bar in Downtown New Haven.  It being early in the Monday Night (American) Football season, I figure this will appeal to many members as there are plenty of large screens to watch games while the rest of us Socialize (gasp!) in the large spacious areas around the bar.  I have not had their wings in a while, but they do have a large selection of various sauces if that's your type of thing.

Their usual Happy Hour Specials run until 7pm and that's all we got.  I will try to update the specifics later this week.

Please RSVP; for Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

A.J. will act as contact and can be reached at 315-345-9348, texting should be fine too.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host (AJ - 3153459348) and/or we're most likely one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday (at least in the early going).
item.name: Happy Hour 9/17 - Buffalo Wild Wings
